ConfigItem.Name: SecureMode
ConfigItem.Description: Enable this so you can't use the installer.pl

ConfigItem.Name: SystemID
ConfigItem.Description: The identify of the system. Each ticket number and each http session id starts with this number
Identfikationsnummer für das installierte OTRS-System. Jede Ticketnummer und http session ID beginnt mit dieser Nummer.

ConfigItem.Name: FQDN
ConfigItem.Description: Full qualified domain name of your system.
Full qualified Domain Name des Systems.

ConfigItem.Name: HttpType
ConfigItem.Description: In case you use https instead of plain http specify it here
Hier stellen sie den http Typ ein.

ConfigItem.Name: ScriptAlias
ConfigItem.Description: Prefix to index.pl used as ScriptAlias in web config

ConfigItem.Name: Organization
ConfigItem.Description: If this is anything other than '', then the email will have an Organization X-Header

ConfigItem.Name: DefaultCharset
ConfigItem.Description: Default frontend charset - "utf-8" is a multi chatset for all possible charsets - e. g. "iso-8859-1" is also possible for single charset

Setting.TextArea:
Hi <OTRS_USERFIRSTNAME>,
you or someone impersonating you has created a new OTRS account for you (<OTRS_USERFIRSTNAME> <OTRS_USERLASTNAME>).
Login: <OTRS_USERLOGIN> Password: <OTRS_USERPASSWORD>
<OTRS_CONFIG_HttpType>://<OTRS_CONFIG_FQDN>/<OTRS_CONFIG_ScriptAlias>customer.pl
Your OTRS Notification Master

ConfigItem.Name: DefaultViewNewLine
ConfigItem.Description: insert new line in text messages after max x chars and the next word
Hier stellen Sie ein, nach wievielen Zeichen in der Text Nachricht eine neue Zeile beginnen soll.

ConfigItem.Name: DefaultPreViewLines
ConfigItem.Description: Max viewable lines in pre view text messages (like ticket lines in the QueueView)
Max. angezeigte Zeilen einer Text Nachricht in der Queue Ansicht

ConfigItem.Name: DefaultViewLines
ConfigItem.Description: Max viewable lines in text messages (like ticket lines in QueueZoom)
Max. angezeigte Zeilen einer Text Nachricht im QueueZoom

ConfigItem.Name: ShowAlwaysLongTime
ConfigItem.Description: show always time in long /days hours minutes/ or short /days hours/ format

ConfigItem.Name: AttachmentDownloadType
ConfigItem.Description: if the tickets attachments will be opened in browser or just to force the download

ConfigItem.Name: CheckEmailAddresses
ConfigItem.Description: Check syntax of used email addresses

ConfigItem.Name: CheckMXRecord
ConfigItem.Description: Check mx recorde of used email addresses
Prüfen des MX record der Email Adressen

ConfigItem.Name: CheckEmailInvalidAddress
ConfigItem.Description: regulärer Ausdruck für nicht gültige E-Mail Adressen

ConfigItem.Name: LogModule
ConfigItem.Description: Log Modul für die backend Module

ConfigItem.Name: LogModule::LogFile::Date
ConfigItem.Description: param if the date (yyyy-mm) should be added as suffix to logfile

ConfigItem.Name: LogSystemCacheSize
ConfigItem.Description: system log cache size for admin system log
Cache Größe für Admin System Log

ConfigItem.Name: SendmailBcc
ConfigItem.Description: Send all outgoing email via bcc to...

ConfigItem.Name: PreApplicationModule
ConfigItem.Description: This interface use useful to check some user options or to redirect not accept new application news

ConfigItem.Name: InfoKey
ConfigItem.Description: Kernel::Modules::AgentInfo check key, if this user preferences key is true, then the message is already accepted

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::NotifyModule###1-CharsetCheck
ConfigItem.Description: agent interface notification module to check the used charset

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::NotifyModule###2-UID-Check
ConfigItem.Description: agent interface notification module to check the admin user id

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Output::PostFilter###ActiveElementFilter
ConfigItem.Description: a output filter for application html output, e. g. to filter java script, java applets, ...
Ein Filter für html Inhalt z.B. zum Filtern von java script, java applets, ...

ConfigItem.Name: SessionModule
ConfigItem.Description: How should be the session-data stored? Advantage of DB is that you can split the Frontendserver from the db-server. fs or ipc is faster.

ConfigItem.Name: SessionName
ConfigItem.Description: Name of the session key. E. g. Session, SessionID, OTRS

ConfigItem.Name: SessionCheckRemoteIP
ConfigItem.Description: If the application is used via a proxy-farm then the remote ip address is mostly different. In this case, turn of the CheckRemoteID.

ConfigItem.Name: SessionDeleteIfNotRemoteID
ConfigItem.Description: Delete session if the session id is used with an invalied remote IP?
Session löschen bei falscher IP Adresse?

ConfigItem.Name: PreApplicationModule
ConfigItem.Description: This interface use useful to check some user options or to redirect not accept new application news

ConfigItem.Name: SessionMaxTime
ConfigItem.Description: Max valid time of one session id in second

ConfigItem.Name: SessionMaxIdleTime
ConfigItem.Description: After this time (in seconds) without new http request, then the user get logged off

ConfigItem.Name: SessionDeleteIfTimeToOld
ConfigItem.Description: Delete session's witch are requested and to old?

ConfigItem.Name: SessionUseCookie
ConfigItem.Description: Should the session management use html cookies? It's more comfortable to send links -==> if you have a valid session, you don't have to login again.) Note: If the client browser disabled html cookies, the system will work as usual, append SessionID to links!

ConfigItem.Name: SessionUseCookieAfterBrowserClose
ConfigItem.Description: store cookies in browser after closing a browser
Cookies nach dem schließen des Browsers nicht löschen?

ConfigItem.Name: SessionDir
ConfigItem.Description: directory for all sessen id informations (if SesseionModul = Kernel::System::AuthSession::FS)

ConfigItem.Name: SessionTable
ConfigItem.Description: Database Table to storage session by SessionModuleDB
Datenbank Tabelle zum speichern der Session wenn SessionModul=DB

ConfigItem.Name: SessionTableID
ConfigItem.Description: Session Tabelle, Feld für die ID

ConfigItem.Name: SessionTableValue
ConfigItem.Description: Session Tabelle, Feld für den value

ConfigItem.Name: TimeZone
ConfigItem.Description: set the system time zone, default is local time +/- 0
Zeitzone, standardmäßig wird die locale Systemzeit verwendet, +/- 0

ConfigItem.Name: TimeWorkingHours
ConfigItem.Description: Counted hours for working time used.

ConfigItem.Name: TimeVacationDaysOneTime
ConfigItem.Description: Einen einmaligen Freizeit-Tage im System hinterlegen.

ConfigItem.Name: WebMaxFileUpload
ConfigItem.Description: Max size for browser file uploads

ConfigItem.Name: ShowMotd
ConfigItem.Description: show message of the day in login screen
Nachrichten des Tages nach Login anzeigen

ConfigItem.Name: DemoSystem
ConfigItem.Description: If this is true, no agent preferences, like language and theme, via agent frontend can be updated! Just for the current session. Alow no password can be changed on agent frontend.

ConfigItem.Name: MIME-Viewer###application/msword
ConfigItem.Description: MIME-Viewer for online to html converter

ConfigItem.Name: SpellChecker
ConfigItem.Description: if ispell or aspell is available, then we will provide a spelling checker

ConfigItem.Name: Package::RepositoryRoot
ConfigItem.Description: get online repository list, use the fist availabe result

ConfigItem.Name: Package::RepositoryRoot
ConfigItem.Description: get online repository list, use the fist availabe result

ConfigItem.Name: WebMaxFileUpload
ConfigItem.Description: Max size for browser file uploads (in byte).
Maximale Größe für Datei-Uploads im Browser (in byte).
